description: lead bas-relief of monkey and cat heads on grey cloth-covered box cover; book of photogravures of sculpture of monkey and cat, entitled, \"Ape and Cat\"; book by Henry James entitled, \"The Madonna of the Future\", with one photogravure and one tipped-in plate
